description: Linux software inventory, EOL tracking, security metrics, and fleet health.

panels.title: Firewall Compliance

panels.title: NTP Compliance

panels.description: Percentage of hosts that do NOT require a reboot.
panels.title: Reboot Compliance

panels.description: Percentage of hosts with zero failed systemd services.
panels.title: Service Health

panels.description: Track compliance percentages over time. Are we improving or slipping?

targets.expr: linux_inventory_packages_total{instance=~"$instance"} * on(instance) group_left(hostname, os_pretty, kernel, virt) linux_system_info{instance=~"$instance"}
